data.name: AboutMenuItem
data.comment: Text for application bar menu item

data.name: AboutPageTitle
data.comment: Text for page title

data.name: AddAppBarButton
data.comment: Used for adding a new iTunes library to the application. Application bar button (needs to be short)

data.name: AddNewLibraryPageDescription
data.value: To pair this device with a new library, download the Pairing Utility from our website:

data.name: AirPlaySpeakersMenuItem
data.comment: Menu item to manage Apple AirPlay speakers.

data.name: AirPlaySpeakersPageTitle
data.comment: Page title for the AirPlay speaker management page

data.name: BrowseLibraryAppBarButton
data.comment: Button on the application bar (needs to be short)

data.name: CancelAppBarButton
data.comment: Application bar button (needs to be short)

data.name: ChooseLibraryMenuItem
data.comment: Application bar menu item

data.name: ChooseLibraryPageTitle
data.comment: Appears at the top of the "choose library" page

data.name: ContactUs
data.comment: "Contact us" is a hyperlink (the brackets are removed)

data.name: FirstRunIntro1
data.value: To pair with iTunes or another compatible application for the first time, run the Pairing Utility on your computer. This utility can be downloaded from our website at:
data.comment: First-run text

data.name: FirstRunIntro2
data.value: When pairing has been completed, tap "Add Library" below to connect to your library.
data.comment: First-run text

data.name: FirstRunIntro3
data.value: It will be necessary for your phone to be connected to a Wi-fi network to continue.
data.comment: First-run text

data.name: FirstRunTitle
data.comment: First-run title

data.name: FollowOnTwitter
data.comment: "@WP7Remote" is a hyperlink (the brackets are removed)

data.name: ForWP7
data.comment: Used on the About page, "Remote for Windows Phone 7"

data.name: FromLastConnectionAttempt
data.comment: States that the information displayed is from a previous connection attempt

data.name: GeniusMixesListItem
data.comment: iTunes Genius Mixes feature

data.name: HomePageTitle
data.comment: Title text displayed on the app's home screen

data.name: LibraryConnectionErrorBody
data.value: Could not connect to the library. Please make sure your phone is connected to the correct Wi-fi network and check the value entered in the hostname field.

data.name: LibraryErrorBody
data.value: An unknown error occurred. Please check your library and try again.
data.comment: Body of a message box

data.name: LibraryErrorTitle
data.comment: Title of a message box

data.name: LibraryHostname
data.comment: This represents the hostname or IP address of a computer

data.name: LibraryNoAlbumsFound
data.value: No albums were found in your library.

data.name: LibraryNoArtistsFound
data.value: No artists were found in your library.

data.name: LibraryNoGenresFound
data.value: No genres were found in your library.

data.name: LibraryNoPlaylistsFound
data.value: No playlists were found in your library.

data.name: LibraryPIN
data.comment: A four-digit PIN used for authentication

data.name: LibraryPINErrorBody
data.value: Could not connect to the library. Please check the PIN and try again.

data.name: LibraryUSBErrorBody
data.value: Could not connect to your library. Please disconnect the USB cable between your phone and computer and try again.

data.name: LibraryVersionErrorBody
data.value: This application currently requires iTunes version 10.1 or later. Please upgrade to the latest version of iTunes to continue.

data.name: LibraryWifiErrorBody
data.value: Please make sure your phone is connected to a Wi-fi network and try again.

data.name: MasterVolume
data.comment: This is the label for a slider that controls the master (primary) volume

data.name: MoreAppBarButton
data.comment: This button displays additional library content types (podcasts, videos, etc.). Application bar button (needs to be short).

data.name: NextAppBarButton
data.comment: For "next track" button on the application bar (needs to be short)

data.name: NotConnected
data.comment: Library status

data.name: NowPlayingAppBarButton
data.comment: Button on the application bar (needs to be short)

data.name: NowPlayingButton
data.comment: Button that shows the user what song is currently playing

data.name: PlayPauseAppBarButton
data.comment: For "play/pause" button on the application bar (needs to be short)

data.name: PreviousAppBarButton
data.comment: For "previous track" button on the application bar (needs to be short)

data.name: SaveAppBarButton
data.comment: Applicaion bar button (needs to be short)

data.name: SearchAppBarButton
data.comment: Button on the application bar (needs to be short)

data.name: SettingsArtistTapAction
data.value: Tap the currently playing artist name to

data.name: SettingsStayConnectedDescription
data.value: Staying connected to your library while the phone is locked will make resuming from the lock screen faster but may use more battery.

data.name: SettingsTakeEffectNextRun
data.value: This change will take effect the next time you start Remote.

data.name: StatusConnectingToLibrary
data.comment: Status text

data.name: StatusTapChooseLibrary
data.value: Tap "Choose Library" to select or add a new library.

data.name: Version
data.comment: Identifying the application version, "Version: 1.6.0.0"
